description: This Java class defines a global exception handler for a Spring Boot web application, providing structured error responses for different types of exceptions encountered during request processing.

classes.name: GlobalExceptionHandler
classes.description: A Spring @ControllerAdvice class that catches and processes exceptions thrown during request handling, returning structured error responses.

methods.name: handleValidation
methods.description: Handles validation errors for @Valid annotated request bodies and parameters, returning a 400 response with details.

methods.name: handleBind
methods.description: Handles data binding errors, returning a 400 response with error details.

methods.name: handleNotReadable
methods.description: Handles unreadable or malformed JSON payloads, returning a 400 response.

methods.name: handleGeneric
methods.description: Fallback handler for all other exceptions, returning a 500 response.

methods.name: baseBody
methods.description: Constructs a standardized response body containing timestamp, status, error, and message information.
